grammar.title: Grammar Practice Test
grammar.description: Test your understanding of A1 grammar concepts

questions.question: Which article is correct: 'I have ___ apple.'
questions.explanation: Use 'an' before words that start with vowel sounds (a, e, i, o, u).

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'She ___ a student.'
questions.explanation: Use 'is' with he/she/it in present simple.

questions.question: Which is correct: 'This is ___ book.'
questions.explanation: Use 'my' as a possessive adjective before nouns.

questions.question: Complete: 'They ___ from London.'
questions.explanation: Use 'are' with they/we/you in present simple.

questions.question: Which question is correct?
questions.explanation: Use 'do/does' to form questions in present simple.

questions.question: What color is the sky on a sunny day?
questions.explanation: The sky is typically blue on sunny days.

questions.question: Which word means 'not big'?
questions.explanation: Small is the opposite of big.

questions.question: What do you call your mother's sister?
questions.explanation: Your mother's sister is your aunt.

questions.question: Which is a fruit?
questions.explanation: Apple is a fruit, the others are vegetables.

questions.question: What do you use to write on paper?
questions.explanation: A pen is used to write on paper.

questions.audioText: Hi, I'm Maria. I'm 25 years old. I live in Madrid. I'm a teacher.
questions.question: How old is Maria?
questions.explanation: Maria says she is 25 years old.

questions.audioText: My phone number is 555-1234. Please call me tomorrow.
questions.question: What is the phone number?
questions.explanation: The speaker says the number is 555-1234.

questions.audioText: The weather is sunny and warm today. It's perfect for a walk.
questions.question: What is the weather like?
questions.explanation: The speaker says it's sunny and warm.

questions.audioText: I like pizza and pasta. My favorite food is Italian.
questions.question: What is the person's favorite food?
questions.explanation: The speaker says their favorite food is Italian.

questions.audioText: The meeting is at 3 PM tomorrow. Don't be late.
questions.question: When is the meeting?
questions.explanation: The speaker says the meeting is tomorrow at 3 PM.

questions.text: WANTED: English teacher for children. Part-time, weekends. Call 555-0123.
questions.question: What job is being offered?
questions.explanation: The ad says 'English teacher for children'.

questions.text: Hi Maria, Thank you for your email. I am happy to help you with your English homework. Please come to my office tomorrow at 2:00 PM. Best regards, Mr. Johnson
questions.question: Who is the email from?
questions.explanation: The email is signed 'Mr. Johnson'.

questions.question: What does this sign mean?
questions.explanation: EXIT means the way out.

questions.text: Hi! Are you free tomorrow? Let's meet for coffee at 3 PM.
questions.question: What does the person want to do?
questions.explanation: The message says 'Let's meet for coffee'.

questions.question: When does this place close?
questions.explanation: The sign shows closing time is 6:00 PM.

finalAssessment.title: A1 Final Assessment
finalAssessment.description: Complete evaluation of your A1 level skills

speaking.title: Speaking Assessment
speaking.description: Record your responses to speaking prompts

questions.prompt: Introduce yourself. Say your name, age, where you're from, and what you do.
Describe your family. Talk about your parents, siblings, and where you live.
Ask for directions to the nearest restaurant.

writing.title: Writing Assessment
writing.description: Complete writing tasks to demonstrate your skills

tasks.task: Write a short email to a friend about your weekend plans.
Fill out a hotel registration form with your personal information.
Write a short note to your roommate about a meeting tomorrow.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Test
comprehensive.description: Mixed questions covering all A1 skills

questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
questions.explanation: Use 'a/an' before singular countable nouns.

questions.question: What is the opposite of 'hot'?
questions.explanation: Cold is the opposite of hot.

questions.audioText: My name is John. I'm from Canada. I speak English and French.
questions.question: What languages does John speak?
questions.explanation: John says he speaks English and French.

questions.text: FOR SALE: Red car, 2018, good condition. $5,000. Phone: 555-0456
questions.question: How much does the car cost?
questions.explanation: The ad shows the price is $5,000.

questions.question: Complete: 'She ___ her homework every day.'
questions.explanation: Use 'does' with he/she/it in present simple.
